channel.title: I can't use clients or run servers! Please help!
channel.description: I can't run servers or clients all it does is when i click run it just pops up then goes away. If you can help me please reply to this. I think its because i have windows 7 but if you can help i will really be glad. Go to: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZlVqGtAOJho]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZlVqGtAOJho[/url] to see what happens.

item.title: I can't use clients or run servers! Please help!
item.dc:creator: @Vince2 Vince,
item.description:
@Vince2 wrote:

C:\Program Files (x86)\Java
use that, after Java your version, and so on, for example, mine

2iw7r5.png1280×800

(C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\java.exe)
(C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe)

Read full topic
